attributes.action: Only allow silent fireworks to be used
attributes.additional_details:
There are many animals, especially dogs that can be viewed on many social media sites. Also  
https://www.westsoundwildlife.org/wildlife/Coexisting/CO_Fireworks.html https://www.qld.gov.au/emergency/safety/explosives-fireworks/fireworks/effects-of-fireworkshttps://www.researchgate.net/profile/Claudia_Brieva/post/Are_there_any_available_studies_on_the_negative_impacts_of_fireworks_on_nesting_seabirds/attachment/59d63a9579197b8077997b46/AS%3A406646724546562%401473963542498/download/Influence+of+fireworks+in+zoo+animals.pdf
attributes.background: Due to the distress the loud noises cause to animals both domestic and wild life. I have owned many dogs over the years, whom I have honestly thought we’re going to pass away with fear.  Along with the elderly and people who have mental health issues who are afraid of sudden load noises.
